snippet.title: Sonic Dream Team - Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Join a race against time to stop Dr. Eggman’s bizarre dreams from coming true. Sonic Dream Team arrives December 5th exclusively on Apple Arcade!​

Pre-register now: https://apple.co/sonic-dream-team​

Dream Team Announce Track:​
Composed by: Tee Lopes​
Instrumentation: Jonny Atma​

Huge shoutout to Powerhouse Animation Studios for helping bring this announcement to life!​

Check out our other social pages to stay-to-date on the latest Sonic happenings:

https://twitter.com/sonic_hedgehog
https://facebook.com/sonic
https://instagram.com/sonicthehedgehog
https://tiktok.com/@sonic_hedgehog
